title: Disable Chat.
body:
Let me permanently disable chat.

Not going to mute everyone every game.

Got leaverbusted for afk, so instead I just feed when someone pisses me off.

Going to get banned eventually.

Just let me disable chat.

> Grow up.

If I was you I'd say the same thing, and I have done many times before, but now that I'm the one in this position it is my turn to say go fuck yourself with a cactus.

My, my, you've changed.

> You can disable All-chat from the game options. But i imagine you are already forced to it.
> If you need help to shut up, you can hotkey a different function to the Enter key.

Why do you switch accounts to post?

I am a wrenchman on EUW and i help moderate the forums. However when i do that somehow my lv30OCE acc turns into a LV30EUW acc and i need to switch manually or i lose all notifications... Annoying, right?

The community of this game has impacted me negatively, yes.

All chat ain't the problem.

Neither is the enter key.

I am mature enough to seek a peaceful resolution, thanks for trying to help but the only useful answer has been to drag chat box off screen. If it stays there permanently then I guess it is a solution.

edit: Tried moving chat off screen, it worked but annoyed the fuck out of me so I just afk'd another game. Guess I quit playing league, bye.
